footer.aboutText: AI-powered contract analysis that helps you understand legal documents in plain language.
footer.disclaimer: Always consult with a qualified legal professional for important decisions. This tool provides AI-assisted analysis for informational purposes only.
footer.copyright: Contract Whisperer. Built with Angular & Chrome AI.
